domain.name: <%= @name %>
domain.devices:
/usr/lib/xen/bin/qemu-dm <% @disks.each do |disk| %>
<source dev='/dev/md<%= disk.second %>'/> <target dev='<%= disk.first.gsub('xvd', 'hd') %>' bus='ide'/>
<% end %>
<% if @eth1_mac %> <mac address='<%= @eth0_mac %>'/> <% end %>
<% if @eth1_mac %> <mac address='<%= @eth1_mac %>'/> <% end %>
<% if @vnc_port %> <graphics type='vnc' port='<%= @vnc_port %>' autoport='no'/> <% end %>
